sentences.en: B : No, it's impossible. If only I had a dishwasher and washing machine!
sentences.cn: 不, 不可能的. 要是我有一台洗碗机和洗衣机就好了.

sentences.en: Dishwasher detergent comes in powder , concentrate or liquid form.
sentences.cn: 洗涤剂有粉末状 、 压缩状或液体.

sentences.en: Do not have any objects lying on top of the dishwasher.
sentences.cn: 请勿放任何杂物在洗碗碟机顶.

sentences.en: Domestic solid - oxide fuel cells are about the size of a dishwasher.
sentences.cn: 内部固态氧化物燃料电池大概有洗碗机大小.

sentences.en: Finally, rinse the cutting board again with hot water or toss it in the dishwasher.
sentences.cn: 最后，再次用热水冲洗切菜板，或者将它放入洗碗机里清洗。

sentences.en: I was a short-order cook and a dishwasher.
sentences.cn: 我曾是一名快餐厨师兼洗碗工。

sentences.en: It has a refrigerator, a freezer, an electric stove and a dishwasher.
sentences.cn: 这里有电冰箱 、 冷冻机 、 电炉和洗碗机.

sentences.en: Kathy: Thanks, Rumei, but I'm going to wash them in the dishwasher.
sentences.cn: 凯西: 谢谢你, 如梅, 不过我要把盘子放进洗碟机里.

sentences.en: Leona put some detergent into the dishwasher, shut the door and pressed the switch.
sentences.cn: 利昂娜将一些清洁剂放入洗碗机，关上门后按了开始键。

sentences.en: Safe to use in ovens, microwave ovens, dishwasher and freezer.
sentences.cn: 可在烤箱, 微波炉, 洗碗机和冰箱中安全使用.

sentences.en: Then you have to act as a dishwasher yourself.
sentences.cn: 那么就由你来充当洗碗机吧.

sentences.en: This new dishwasher will get through all the dirty dishes like a dose of salts.
sentences.cn: 这台新的洗碗机一会儿就能把所有的脏盘子洗干净.

sentences.en: To pay for his schooling, he worked as a cook, dishwasher, laundryman, and housekeeper.
sentences.cn: 为了支付学费, 他当过厨师 、 洗碗工 、 洗衣工和管家等等.

sentences.en: We got a 20 percent rake - off on the dishwasher.
sentences.cn: 我们的洗碗机有百分之二十的 回扣.
我们已给洗碟机接上水管了.

sentences.en: You also have perfect cooking facilities and a dishwasher.
sentences.cn: 您还可以享用烹饪设备和洗碗机.

sentences.en: You can even clean toothbrush in the dishwasher once in a while.
sentences.cn: 你甚至可以偶尔将牙刷放在洗碗机中清洁一下.
